workflow.name: Track freelance jobs from Apify and get instant WhatsApp alerts for new leads
workflow.description:
![Screenshot 20251024 210656.png](fileId:3107)

Automatically track new freelance job postings from any platform using **Apify Actors**, process the results, and get **real-time WhatsApp alerts** for new opportunities.  
This workflow saves jobs to Google Sheets for record-keeping and sends instant notifications so you never miss a client lead.

---

## Who‚Äôs it for
Freelancers, agencies, and business developers who want to monitor platforms like **Upwork, Fiverr, or Freelancer** for new jobs ‚Äî without checking manually.

---

## How it works
1. The workflow starts when a **chat message** or trigger event is received.  
2. It runs an **Apify Actor** to scrape job listings from your target platform.  
3. The **dataset results** are fetched via Apify‚Äôs API.  
4. A **JavaScript Code node** processes and filters the results for relevant jobs.  
5. The data is saved to **Google Sheets** for tracking and reporting.  
6. A formatted job summary is created and sent as a **WhatsApp message** directly to your phone.

---

## How to set up
1. Create or use an **Apify Actor** for scraping job listings from your chosen site.  
2. Connect your **Apify API token** in n8n under credentials.  
3. Link your **Google Sheets** account and specify the sheet for storing job data.  
4. Add your **WhatsApp Cloud API** or **Twilio WhatsApp** credentials.  
5. Test the workflow by sending a trigger message ‚Äî new jobs will be fetched, stored, and sent to WhatsApp.

---

## Requirements
- Apify account with API access  
- Google Sheets integration  
- WhatsApp Cloud API or Twilio account  
- n8n Cloud or self-hosted instance  

---

## How to customize
- üß© **Add filters:** Include keyword or budget filters in the JavaScript node.  
- üîÑ **Schedule runs:** Replace the chat trigger with a **Cron node** for hourly or daily tracking.  
- üìä **Change destination:** Save results to Notion, Airtable, or Slack instead of Google Sheets.  
- üó£Ô∏è **Multi-channel alerts:** Send updates to Discord, Telegram, or Email as well.

---

**Stay ahead of freelance opportunities ‚Äî this n8n workflow finds jobs, logs them, and alerts you instantly via WhatsApp.**

parameters.content: # Freelance Job Tracker with WhatsApp Alerts

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet1

parameters.content:
## üíº Freelance Job Tracker with WhatsApp Alerts (Apify + n8n)

## üü® Workflow Overview

This workflow automates freelance job tracking by using Apify Actors to scrape job listings (e.g., from Upwork or Fiverr) and sends real-time WhatsApp alerts when new opportunities are found.
It‚Äôs designed for freelancers, agencies, and solopreneurs who want to stay updated without constantly checking job sites.

üß© Sticky Notes Summary

üü© 1. When Chat Message Received (Trigger)

This node listens for a message in WhatsApp (via the connected API or webhook).
You can also trigger it manually to start the workflow when needed.

üü© 2. Run Apify Actor

Runs your Apify Actor that scrapes freelance job listings from platforms like Upwork, Freelancer, or Fiverr.
Make sure your Apify API token is connected in credentials and that your actor ID matches the one from your Apify dashboard.

üü© 3. Get Dataset Items

Retrieves the latest dataset items (scraped job listings) from the Apify run.
Each dataset item usually contains job title, link, description, and price/rate.

üü© 4. Code (JavaScript)

This node filters and formats the dataset results.
Example: Only include jobs that contain specific keywords like automation, Python, or n8n.
It also limits the number of alerts to avoid message spam.

üü© 5. Edit Fields

Maps the cleaned data (title, budget, URL) into proper fields for further processing.
This ensures consistent message formatting for both Sheets and WhatsApp.

üü© 6. Append or Update Row in Google Sheet

Logs each new job found into your Google Sheet for record-keeping.
If a job already exists (based on URL), it updates instead of duplicating ‚Äî keeping your sheet clean.

üü© 7. Edit Fields (Prepare Message)

Prepares the message text for WhatsApp.
Example:

üîî New Job Alert!
üíº {{job_title}}
üí∞ Budget: {{price}}
üîó Link: {{url}}


üü© 8. Send WhatsApp Message

Sends the formatted alert message directly to your WhatsApp using your WhatsApp API or Twilio integration.
This is the final step that keeps you instantly informed when new jobs are posted.

nodes.name: Edit Fields To send Specific Data

parameters.content:
# üß† Who It‚Äôs For

## 1-Freelancers and solopreneurs looking for instant job alerts

## 2-Agencies monitoring job boards for leads

## 3-Developers wanting to automate freelance opportunity tracking

# ‚öôÔ∏è Requirements

## 1-Apify account (with an active Actor for job scraping)

## 2-WhatsApp API / Twilio setup for message delivery

## 3-Google Sheets account for tracking job logs

## 4-n8n Cloud or self-hosted instance

# üí° Pro Tip

## You can schedule this workflow to run every few hours using the Cron node ‚Äî it will automatically check for new jobs and send alerts even when you‚Äôre offline.

json.title: Product management for SaaS platform
json.description: Product Manager Key Responsibilities:  Product Development & Management:  Own the ongoing technical development of the Hlido platform, collaborating with developers to deliver new features, workflows, and improvements.  Act as the primary product owner, prioritizing feature releases and backlog management.  Drive partner portal development (from requirements gathering to rollout, feedback, and continuous iteration).  User & Partner Engagement:  Develop and execute strategies for reaching out to both current and prospective users and partners to validate product fit and drive adoption.  Coordinate onboarding processes for partners and clients, ensuring smooth integration and ongoing satisfaction.  Collect and analyze user and partner feedback, translating insights into actionable product improvements.  Marketing & Content:  Oversee marketing content creation and distribution, ensuring alignment with product positioning and customer needs.  Collaborate with marketing to prepare launch materials, product updates, and educational resources.  Regularly update web content, help guides, and social media channels to engage and inform the audience.  Cross-Functional Collaboration:  Work closely with engineering, sales, marketing, and external partners.  Support business development, including representing Hlido at customer meetings, webinars, and industry events.  Process Optimization:  Monitor and improve internal processes (automation workflows, customer onboarding, alerting, partner management).  Advocate for best practices in product management and SaaS delivery.  Qualifications:  Experience managing SaaS or B2B software products, preferably in compliance, automation, or enterprise platforms.  Strong technical understanding (API integrations, automation workflows, cloud platforms like n8n, Airtable, Framer).  Proven ability in product ownership: backlog management, user stories, feature prioritization.  Excellent communication skills‚Äîwritten and verbal‚Äîfor engaging users, partners, and internal teams.  Experience with marketing content development and multi-channel campaign execution.  Track record of working with developers and cross-functional teams.  Startup experience and adaptability are strong assets.

json.title: Backend Integration Dev Automation Specialist | n8n | GHL | EHR API | HIPAA Compliant
json.description:
We‚Äôre Lead Better HQ, an automation and marketing platform built for functional and integrative medicine practices.

We already use Go High Level (GHL) to manage patient leads and communication.

Now we want to connect GHL with the EHRs (Practice Better, Cerbo and others) using n8n, to automate the new patient onboarding process and remove manual data entry.

This will be an internal-only middleware ‚Äî no customer interface, just clean, reliable automations running privately on our server.

‚öôÔ∏è The Project

We need you to help us set up and build workflows in n8n that securely pass data between GHL and EHRs.

Core Workflows:

GHL ‚Üí EHR

When a new contact or form submission occurs in GHL, create or update a client record in the EHR.

Include field mappings (name, email, DOB, insurance, notes, etc.).

Handle duplicates, missing data, and errors gracefully.

EHR ‚Üí GHL

When an appointment is booked or updated in the EHR, update the contact in GHL with appointment status and tags.

Error Handling + Alerts

Slack/email notification for failed jobs.

Basic retry logic for failed API calls.

Deployment & Security

Host n8n on AWS (ECS, EC2, or Cloud Run equivalent).

Set up environment variables, secret storage, and SSL.

Ensure the setup meets HIPAA best practices (encryption, no PHI in logs).

üîß Technical Skills Required

Proven experience building automations in n8n.

Strong understanding of webhooks, REST APIs, and JSON data mapping.

Experience with Go High Level or Practice Better / Cerbo API a huge plus.

Comfortable working with AWS or GCP for hosting (basic DevOps knowledge).

Knows how to handle authentication, retries, and rate limiting.

Can document work clearly (Loom videos + short SOPs).

üß± Deliverables

Working n8n instance deployed on our cloud account.

3‚Äì5 functioning workflows (GHL ‚Üí EHR, EHR ‚Üí GHL).

Slack/email error notifications.

Documentation for:

How workflows are set up

How to update mappings

How to add new automations


Beyond creating this middleware bridge, we're also looking to add you to our team as a part-time dev to help our clients.

json.title: AI Agent Development on N8N or Similar Platform
json.description: We are seeking a skilled freelancer to develop an AI agent using N8N or a similar platform. The AI agent will be responsible for automating tasks such as Resume creating, email management and networking. The ideal candidate should have experience with workflow automation tools and a good understanding of AI integration.

json.title: Collaboration in N8N automatisation in French start up
json.description:
Project overview
We‚Äôre launching a European version of an app concept that‚Äôs already performing strongly in the US market. The product logic and structure are already set ‚Äî our main goal now is to automate key workflows efficiently to save time and scale faster.

What we‚Äôre looking for
We‚Äôre searching for a developer specialized in automation, ideally with experience in:
	‚Ä¢	n8n (preferred) or similar automation tools
	‚Ä¢	API connections & integrations
	‚Ä¢	Building efficient and maintainable workflow logic
	‚Ä¢	Handling webhooks, API triggers, and data synchronization

Mission details
	‚Ä¢	Duration: around one week (short-term)
	‚Ä¢	Scope: set up and optimize automation flows for the app
	‚Ä¢	We already have the system logic and structure ‚Äî you‚Äôll mainly help with execution and optimization
	‚Ä¢	You‚Äôll work closely with the founders

Compensation options
We‚Äôre open to either:
	‚Ä¢	A flat-rate mission, or
	‚Ä¢	A revenue-share model (percentage on recurring revenue)

Profile
	‚Ä¢	Autonomous, fast, and solution-oriented
	‚Ä¢	Comfortable working async (we‚Äôre remote-first)
	‚Ä¢	Strong communication and ability to document clean processes

json.title: AI Employee Development Specialist
json.description: We are seeking an experienced AI developer to assist in creating an AI-powered virtual employee. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in artificial intelligence and machine learning, with expertise in developing intelligent systems that can perform tasks autonomously. This role involves designing algorithms, training models, and integrating the AI with existing workflows for efficiency and productivity. If you have a passion for AI and a track record of innovative solutions, we want to hear from you!

json.title: n8n Workflow Developer Needed: Book Recommendation Aggregator System
json.description: We need an experienced n8n developer to create an automated workflow that discovers and processes human-curated book recommendations from the web. The system will use Claude AI and/or Perplexity API for intelligent web search, data extraction and processing.

json.title: N8N Flow Audit and Chatbot Setup for Facebook Pages
json.description: We are seeking a skilled freelancer to audit and finalize our N8N flow, focusing on verifying the post node, AI agent memory, and HTTP requests. The primary goal is to develop a chatbot for Facebook pages, with each business having its own memory setup.

json.title: Studio legale
json.description:
Buongiorno,
Sono un avvocato e ho necessit√† di implementare un sistema di automazioni per il mio studio legale utilizzando n8n. L'obiettivo √® integrare e sincronizzare diversi strumenti che utilizziamo quotidianamente per eliminare doppie digitazioni, automatizzare flussi di lavoro ricorrenti e garantire che nessuna scadenza venga persa.
Obiettivo principale
Creare un ecosistema integrato dove Notion rappresenta la fonte di verit√† centrale (database PRATICHE), sincronizzato bidirezionalmente con Asana (usato dalla mia collaboratrice), Google Calendar, Google Drive, WhatsApp Business e Gmail.
Strumenti da integrare
* Notion: Database centrale delle pratiche con sistema di protocollazione FM[numero]-[tipo]
* Asana: Gestione task della collaboratrice, deve rimanere sincronizzato con Notion
* Google Drive: Archiviazione documenti organizzata per pratica
* Google Calendar: Gestione udienze e appuntamenti
* WhatsApp Business: Comunicazioni con clienti, ricezione documenti e messaggi audio
* Gmail: 3 account email (personale + 2 di lavoro)
* iCloud Calendar: Sincronizzazione con Google Calendar
* App Giustizia, Quadra, Simpliciter: Se possibile, integrazioni future.
* 
* Workflow prioritari da implementare
1. Gestione scadenze e udienze con promemoria 7-3-1
* Quando viene creata una scadenza o udienza in Notion ‚Üí crea evento in Google Calendar + task in Asana
* Invia notifiche automatiche a 7, 3 e 1 giorno prima tramite WhatsApp e email
2. Gestione messaggi WhatsApp in arrivo
* Nuovo messaggio WhatsApp da cliente ‚Üí crea una scadenza "Rispondere a [Cliente]" in Notion + task in Asana
* Se il messaggio contiene allegati (PDF, immagini) ‚Üí salva su Google Drive nella cartella della pratica + applica OCR se necessario
* Se il messaggio √® audio ‚Üí trascrivi con AI (Whisper/Google Speech-to-Text) + salva trascrizione
3. Gestione email in arrivo (Gmail)
* Nuova email rilevante ‚Üí salva allegati su Google Drive nella cartella pratica corretta
* Crea scadenza/task in Notion e Asana se necessario
* Collega automaticamente alla pratica corrispondente
4. Sincronizzazione Notion ‚Üî Asana
* Modifica titolo pratica in Notion ‚Üí aggiorna tutti i task correlati in Asana
* Cambio stato task in Asana ‚Üí aggiorna Notion
* Nuova pratica in Notion ‚Üí crea progetto/task corrispondente in Asana
5. Hot-folder su Google Drive
* Nuovo documento caricato nella cartella di una pratica ‚Üí registra in Notion + crea sub-task di verifica in Asana
6. Trascrizione riunioni
* File audio caricato su Drive ‚Üí trascrizione automatica + riepilogo AI + creazione nota in Notion + task follow-up in Asana
Caratteristiche del sistema di protocollazione
* Formato: FM[numero progressivo]-[tipo]
* Tipi: O (ordinarie), E (esecutive), P (penali), L (lavoro)
* Esempio: FM001-O, FM015-P
* Questo protocollo deve essere coerente tra Notion, Asana e naming delle cartelle Drive
Struttura dati principale
Database Notion PRATICHE include:
* Protocollo pratica
* Cliente
* Tipo procedimento
* Ruolo (attore/convenuto)
* Tribunale
* Giudice
* Data apertura
* Stato pratica
* Collegamenti a documenti Drive
* Scadenze e udienze
* Note e comunicazioni
Requisiti tecnici
* Uso di n8n (self-hosted o cloud)
* Gestione errori e logging delle automazioni
* Sistema di fallback in caso di mancata sincronizzazione
* Documentazione dei workflow creati
* Formazione base per permettermi di fare piccole modifiche in futuro
Deliverable attesi
* Workflow n8n funzionanti e testati per i 6 casi d'uso prioritari
* Documentazione tecnica di ogni workflow
* Guida utente semplificata
* 1-2 sessioni di training per me e la collaboratrice
* Supporto post-implementazione per eventuali bug (da definire)

json.title: Make ‚Üí n8n Migration Expert (Automation + Lovable Integration for SaaS)
json.description:
We‚Äôre building LaValor Slate, an AI-powered SaaS tool for film and TV production scheduling.
Our current automation runs on Make.com, using OpenAI, Airtable, and Google Sheets modules to parse film scripts, check conflicts, and export shooting plans.

Now we‚Äôre ready to migrate the entire setup to n8n using our own accounts, improving reliability, and connecting everything to our Lovable frontend (landing page + webhook form).

We need someone experienced enough to understand complex Make workflows, rebuild them cleanly in n8n, and deliver a stable, tested result as soon as possible.

json.title: Build AI Marketing Automation System ‚Äì Odoo + n8n + OpenAI
json.description:
We operate multiple Shopify-based eCommerce brands and are looking for an experienced AI Automation Engineer / Odoo Developer to build a next-generation marketing automation system that intelligently connects:
-   Odoo ERP (core data hub: CRM, orders, analytics)
-   n8n Orchestration Engine (rules, automations, monitoring)
-   Ad Platforms: Meta, Google, Pinterest
-   AI Middleware: OpenAI GPT API (copy generation, insights, optimization)
-  Optional: GoHighLevel or Odoo Marketing for funnels and WhatsApp/SMS/email communication
-  The system should automate campaign analysis, attribution, ad scaling, reporting, and communication ‚Äî creating a self-learning, monitored, and secure marketing OS.

Objectives:

Data Integration:
- Connect Shopify, Odoo, and ad platforms (Meta, Google, Pinterest).
- Centralize campaign, spend, and ROAS data into Odoo (PostgreSQL).

Automation & AI Logic (via n8n):
- Build rules for ad scaling, pausing, and alerting.
- Integrate with ChatGPT API for copywriting and insight generation.
- Implement message queue, retries, and monitoring checkpoints.

Tracking & Attribution:
- Build server-side GA4 + Meta Conversion API.
- Implement a UTM capture/redirector for accurate ROAS tracking.

Analytics & Reporting:
- Connect Metabase / Power BI directly to Odoo database.
- Create real-time dashboards for ROAS, CAC, and campaign health.
- Daily email/Slack reports with key metrics and anomalies.

Monitoring & Security:
- Add workflow monitoring dashboards (API uptime, sync status).
- Implement encrypted credential vault & automated backups.

When Applying, Please Include:
- Examples of AI-driven or Odoo-based automation projects you‚Äôve built.
- Your experience with n8n, OpenAI API, and Ad Platform integrations.
- Your proposed timeline and milestone breakdown.
- Portfolio or GitHub/Notion documentation (if available).
